channel.title: How to disable admins drop and make mod+ for yell
channel.description: Okay for admin part: I changed the admin_cant_drop to false but still they can drop.. and the yell i want it to be mod+ where do i go?

i did what u said but then it just fux up can some1 teamview me? would apprieciate it Msn: henkiukas@hotmail.com

item.title: How to disable admins drop and make mod+ for yell
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

imsuperman05:

No they cannot because there’s no yell for regular players, so nothing will show up.

o lol i just scanned through, i actually read it this time, ik what you mean, but the way i did it is kinda easier.

item.title: How to disable admins drop and make mod+ for yell
item.dc:creator: @Acrodox Acrodox
item.description:
@Acrodox wrote:

for mod plus go to C:\Users\Secondary\Desktop\Server\src\server\model\players\packets

Commands.java

then CTRL + F yell

Once you find it, it should look like this

then add

to the end of it so itll look like

Hope i helped

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:402771”]add this after your yell command but in the code like after the last yell.

[code]}else if (c.playerRights == 0 {
c.sendMessage(“Only for mod+”);

						}
					}
				}
			}[/code][/quote]

That just tells people only mod+ can use it , but normal players can still use it.

Read full topic
